column4: How can I have the exec bit set, when I mount a NTFS partition via nautilus?

there are two possible issues.  One: the partition is noexec.  Two: the file is does not have executable permission

dev/sda7 on /media/Games1 type fuseblk (rw,nosuid,nodev,allow_other,blksize=4096,default_permissions)
